results.title: A risk-benefit assessment of metformin in type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has been used for over 40 years as an effective @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@-lowering agent in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Noninsulin_Dependent_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563323 @@@type 2 (noninsulin-dependent) diabetes mellitus@@@.

results.title: Diurnal pattern of plasma metformin concentrations and its relation to metabolic effects in type 2 (non-insulin-dependent) diabetic patients.
results.text_hl: The authors describe the diurnal profile of plasma @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ concentrations in a group of 6 @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Noninsulin_Dependent_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563323 @@@Type 2 (noninsulin-dependent) diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ studied at two different daily @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ doses (500 mg and 850 mg b.d.) and report data on the relationships between plasma @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and metabolic effects over a 14 h period.

citations.NLM: Marchetti P, Gregorio F, Benzi L, Giannarelli R, Cecchetti P, Villani G, Di Cianni G, Di Carlo A, Brunetti P, Navalesi R. Diurnal pattern of plasma metformin concentrations and its relation to metabolic effects in type 2 (non-insulin-dependent) diabetic patients. Diabete Metab. 1990 Dec;16(6):473-8. PMID: 2086278
